questions.question: What is the primary goal of supervised learning in machine learning?

options.A: To group similar data points into clusters
options.B: To train a model to make predictions on new, unseen data
options.C: To identify patterns in data without a target variable
options.D: To reduce the dimensionality of a dataset

questions.question: Which of the following machine learning algorithms is commonly used for classification problems?
What is overfitting in machine learning?

options.A: When a model is too simple and fails to capture the underlying patterns in the data
options.B: When a model is too complex and performs well on the training data but poorly on new data
options.C: When a model is biased towards a particular class or group
options.D: When a model takes too long to train
